# Comparison with @magnetic/flex

| Props     | MDS | CDS |
| --------- | --- | --- |
| margin    | ✅  | ✅  |
| align     | ✅  | ✅  |
| direction | ✅  | ✅  |
| gap       | ✅  | ✅  |
| grow      | ✅  | ✅  |
| justify   | ✅  | ✅  |
| reverse   | ✅  | ✅  |
| wrap      | ✅  | ✅  |
| className | ✅  | ✅  |
| as        |     | ✅  |
